analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x3a6b73f29c9ee8c80efd29a99b6035bcb03774ce.sol:
	Contract Mahir has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x3a6b73f29c9ee8c80efd29a99b6035bcb03774ce.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x3a6b73f29c9ee8c80efd29a99b6035bcb03774ce.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
